title: Urea & ammonium fluoride di-nitrogens and Cu & Fe bi-metals co-doped carbon felt as cathode for electro-Fenton degradation to norfloxacin: 1O2-dominated oxidation pathway
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00210E, Paper
Jing Li, Lili Gao, Yue Chen, Xinyi Meng, Xuelian Li, Kai Qi, Jiandong Zhang
Carbon materials co-doped with both metals and non-metallic heteroatoms have been important research hotpots as the catalysts for Heterogeneous Electro-Fenton technology in disposal of refractory organics. However, there is still...
